p: Nucleotide sequence data, phylogenetic trees and associated information tables for the global subsample of internal segments, and the set of subtype H5 segment 4s can be found in the electronic supplementary material and are available from the Dryad Digital Repository: https://doi.org/10.5061/dryad.5nb504n [ 223]. The phylogenetic trees may also be explored with an online tool; please see the supplementary text for details.
